card.name: Abolish
card.property: You may discard a Plains card rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Aura Fracture
card.property: Sacrifice a land: Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Avatar of Hope
card.property: If you have 3 or less life, this spell costs {6} less to cast. Flying Avatar of Hope can block any number of creatures.

card.name: Blessed Wind
card.property: Target player's life total becomes 20.

card.name: Celestial Convergence
card.property: Celestial Convergence enters with seven omen counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an omen counter from Celestial Convergence. If there are no omen counters on Celestial Convergence, the player with the highest life total wins the game. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, the game is a draw.

card.name: Entangler

card.name: Glittering Lion

card.property: Lands target player controls don't untap during their next untap step.

card.name: Overburden
card.property: Whenever a player puts a nontoken creature onto the battlefield, that player returns a land they control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Psychic Theft
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled. At the beginning of the next end step, if you haven't cast the card, return it to its owner's hand.
